metadata.title: CVE-2021-43725 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SpotPage_login.phpof Spotweb 1.5.1 and below, which allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the data[performredirect] parameter.

criterions.comment: spotweb package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
